title: Gunners Dismantle Tottenham In The North London Derby
description:
The FC crew recap the Arsenal impressive defeat over Tottenham in the North Derby, and discuss the rest of Saturdays Premier League fixtures and what it all means for the top 4 race. Plus, Luis Garcia discusses Barcelona's 1-0 over Mallorca, and Gab Marcotti recaps Saturday's Serie A Results.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Arsenal Defeat Tottenham in the North London Derby, Barcelona 1-0 win over Mallorca, Recap of Saturday's Serie A Results
